items.content_html: A lightweight web tool that allows users to fetch favicons from any domain, download them as PNG files, or generate their SVG equivalents. This tool provides a seamless and user-friendly interface for developers, designers, or anyone who needs to retrieve favicons with ease.

This tool provides a seamless and user-friendly interface for developers, designers, or anyone who needs to retrieve favicons with ease.
